example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS افلحت) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الصورة)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM المرافقة) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN لاتصالات))))) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN كسر) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الجمود))) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN خلق) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التأثير))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: the image associated with the calls
in breaking the apathy and stirring things up
